name: Magna Cat
description:
This is pinball, But with a TWIST! 

Explore these four fun and exciting levels with your Polarity changing Magnet

 launching the ball Across the stage. Theres even a built in Level Editor. 

Feel free to Share your level codes in the comments. (press E to save a level)

•SOUNDS• MixKit Scratch

•CODE•  Myself

•GRAPHICS• Myself

BUGS

If the volume slider stays while it shouldn't just restart the game. 

the edges of the screen should be cropped out but at this point in the jam they are not worth fixing right now. 

Thank you for Playing my game :)
